definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: I say then, Have they stumbled that they should fall?
sentences.chinese: 我且說，他們失腳是要他們跌倒嗎。

sentences.english: Now it came to pass that this soul yearned and yearned to know itself.
sentences.chinese: 且說，這個靈魂變得越來越渴望認識它自己。

sentences.english: Master Lonely Nine Swords first taught Zhou Benchi“Eighteen Ways of Beating the Dragon”.
sentences.chinese: 且說孤獨九劍首先傳授周奔馳“降龍十八掌”。

sentences.english: ZhangJi into LvGu, called him a coward, and said lu lady died.
sentences.chinese: 張吉闖入呂家，罵他是個懦夫，並且說呂夫人死了。

sentences.english: And then ‘Bron looked at both of us and said, ‘This is crazy.
sentences.chinese: 然後勒布朗看到了我們並且說，‘這太瘋狂了。

sentences.english: In countries where the land compensation policy, and said quite understand.
sentences.chinese: 土地補償金國家是有政策的，並且說的很明白。

sentences.english: So I was satisfied, and said we would waltz in on it.
sentences.chinese: 因此我挺滿意，並且說我們該說幹就幹。

sentences.english: By the way, have you seen the new picture which is playing at Radio City this week?
sentences.chinese: 且說，你已經看過本星期在無線電城上映的新片嗎？

sentences.english: Master Lonely Nine Swords first taught Zhou Benchi“Eighteen Ways of Beating the Dragon”. Zhou was very delighted, and he practiced had for three days.
sentences.chinese: 且說孤獨九劍首先傳授周奔馳“降龍十八掌”。

sentences.english: Well, as things at last fell out, I found an admirable opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 且說到了事情的末尾，我終於找到了一個良機。

sentences.english: If you simply sit back and say, It sure would be fun to levitate .
sentences.chinese: 如果你們坐一下並且說，輕輕浮起它的確是有趣的。

sentences.english: They wish to be propitious and prosperous. All these traditions symbolize beginning and renewal.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥如意，且說今天就是“一元復始，萬象更新。”

definition: to send (sb) away/to change the subject/to open (an umbrella etc)
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy/all smiles
